document_data.mainbody:
Barim Stagwinter was one of the rulers of Boareskyr Bridge in 1359 DR.
Based in Boareskyr Bridge, Barim, together with Theskul Mirroreye, became one of the de facto rulers of that place, protecting it from trolls, brigands, wolves, and worse, which attacked during winters. He sponsored and directed some adventuring parties to expel serpentfolk from the Serpent Hills. He supported Theskul in his project to built a shrine to Tyr in exchange for support to build a castle and the title of Baron of Boareskyr for Barim.
